title: EBlub Ets2OnMac v1.0
description:
Ets2OnMac v1.0


This is MAC OS-X version of your Euro Truck Simulator 2 v1.9.24.1 PC game

v merged Windows OS model game into Mac OS compatibility game versions.


and alSo included EBlubTec Ets2OnMac Mergmod v1.01 config mod for low config computer systems.



================================================================================================================================

this is for our test demo game model for PC game on Mac systems

Instal Instruction :

1. download desired link 

2. unzip with StuffIt Expander on the main 7z file. by double clicking.. 

3. It will automatically open the DMG file. Agree with open..

4. now 2click to Run the EBlub Ets2OnMac v1.0.mpkg file and., fallow the onscreen instructions to instal the EURO TRUCK SIMULATOR 2 gam on ur MAC OS-X. 

5. Enjoy our Mergame for your Mac OS systems..



v need your feedback and presence to ours.. team
